posts.title: The clever little bird
posts.author: by. E. Hyperraccoon
posts.text: A little bird comes and sits under a tree. A big grey cat comes to the tree too. He sees the little bird.  'I'm hungry'- says the cat and comes near the bird. But the little bird is very clever. She sees the cat and jumps into the tree.

posts.title: limerick Erdogan
posts.text: There was a young fellow from Ankara  Who was a terrific wankerer  Till he sowed his wild oats  With the help of a goat  But he didnâ€™t even stop to thankera -24
posts.author: by.Erdogan
